com.team1389.watch

Class LogFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team1389.watch.LogFile

  • public class LogFile
extends java.lang.Object
    handles logging to a specific given file
    Author:
    amind

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  LogFile.FileNameSupplier
      a wrapper around the Supplier for Strings specifically
      static class  LogFile.LogType
      represents a log format

      • make

        public static LogFile make(LogFile.FileNameSupplier format,
                           java.lang.String path,
                           LogFile.LogType type)
        generates a LogFile with the given naming convention and folder path
        Parameters:
        format - the naming convention, a String supplier
        path - the string path to the log folder - should end with a '/'
        type - the format of the log file
        Returns:
        a fresh LogFile
        See Also:
        LogFile.FileNameSupplier, dateTimeFormatter(), getFormatter(DateTimeFormatter)
